channel.description: Recent content in inspired on Yu-Fen Huang

item.title: If precipitation extremes are increasing, why aren't floods?
item.description: I appreciate all the efforts that has been done for the previous research. Some papers provide us knowledge; some papers correct our imagination of the world; some papers gave a clear picture of how the world processing, and some papers inspire and encourage us. Ashish’s paper is one of the inspiration, at least to me. I met Dr. Ashish Sharma in the Asia Oceania Geosciences Society conference this year. I accidently went to his talk, and was impressed by how clear he explain a concept.
